casebody.data:
Charles UDOH, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
ENTERPRISE RENTAL CAR INC., and John Mattone, Defendants,
and
Christopher G. Turner, Defendant. M-1445 September Term 2017
080139 Supreme Court of New Jersey. JULY 20, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification is denied.
